roleset.name: not be prompt
roleset.note: TARRY-V NOTES: Added by Kevin. Verbnet entry linger-53.1. (from tarry.01-v)

example.name: Biblical
example.text: He doubtless tarried over those psalms messianic in character for years.
example.arg: over those psalms messianic in character

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: Gus tarried in Baltimore while on his way to Washington.
example.arg: while on his way to Washington
